name: Brackets [Web]
description:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/MLBWEB-356


Error Submit
Prerequisite:
bracket must be inactive (e.g. - '/es/brackets/food-fight-2021')
expected notification: 'Something went wrong when submitting your bracket.'

Everything else below this line can be tested at:

https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/brackets/home-run-derby-2022 

Error Submit Underage
expected notification: 'Sorry! You are not eligible to play this bracket.'

Error First And Last Name
expected notification: 'Please provide your first and last name'

Error Tiebreakers
expected notification: 'Please answer all required questions *'

Error Invalid Date Of Birth
expected notification: 'Please enter a valid Date of Birth'

Info Login
expected notification: 'Log In to your MLB account to view your bracket entry'

Submit Success
expected notification: 'Bracket has been submitted successfully.'

Info Bracket Reset
Prerequisite:
Logged in
Has submitted bracket previously

arrive to page

expected notification: 'Previous bracket submission found and all picks are updated to previously submitted state.'

Error Submit Locked
Prerequisite:
Bracket config > App State: live
Bracket config > Bracket State: open

fill out bracket

click submit

fill out all fields appropriately

go to Contentful and update Bracket config:
 a. App State: live
 b. Bracket State: locked

go back to bracket and click submit

log in

fill out all fields appropriately

expected notification: 'Bracket submission failed as bracket is in locked state.'

Info Locked
Prerequisite:
Bracket config > App State: post
Bracket config > Bracket State: locked

arrive to page

expected notification: 'The bracket contest is now locked. Check back soon to see the results!'
